verbose_text: In the first experiment, 4 weeks after surgery, mice were fasted overnight (16h) and then gavaged with 1g/kg glucose, and tail blood glucose levels were measured before and 5, 15, 30, 45, 60, 90 and 120 min after the gavage using a glucometer (Alpha Trak 2 pet blood glucose meter) and plasma samples for insulin and GLP-1 were collected at 0, 5 and 15min.
